title: Suella Braverman – 2022 Comments on Suspected Deaths in Channel
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Suella Braverman, the Home Secretary, on Twitter on 14 December 2022.
content: I am aware of a distressing incident in the Channel this morning and I am being kept constantly updated while agencies respond and urgently establish the full facts. My heartfelt thoughts are with all those involved.
